1. Check cron installed or not.
2. Install uuencode
3. Check the path inside Config files:
        1.node installed path
        2.csv file path
        3.csv zip folder path
        4.path of time.js
        5.sender and recipient mail address
        6.subject of the mail
5. check the path inside Cron_Config.txt (bash file path, bash installed path)
6. Check the installed path of uuencode, sendmail inside cron_job.sh
7. Check the config file path included inside cron_job.sh
8. Set the time in Cron_Config.txt
   Eg: 12 9 * * * - it generate mail at 9.12 am everyday...
9. In terminal run crontab Cron_Config.txt (please specify full path)
